subject: Re: Flushed pending centeris patch queue
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

simo wrote:
> On Sun, 2007-05-06 at 17:37 -0500, Gerald (Jerry) Carter wrote:
>> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
>> Hash: SHA1
>>
>> Hey guys,
>>
>> I've pushed out all my pending patches for winbindd except:
>>
>> (a) security = ads & machine password change in winbindd
>> (b) username map support for winbindd
>>
>> Since these might possibly require some discussion and general
>> agreement, I'll post patches to the list here.
> 
> Thank you Jerry,
> this is a lot of good code, I am going through it and made some comments
> to the relevant commit when necessary.
> 
> I will try to test this stuff asap myself as well.

Thanks.  If you have questions about why I did
things a certain way, just ping me.




cheers, jerry
